name: Erick R. Pajares Balceda
professional_summary: Software developer with experience in production-grade systems and currently studying Software Development at SENATI. I started programming at age 15 and since 2023 have been formally and actively pursuing my professional reconversion. I combine self-taught skills, technical training, and hands-on experience in both backend and frontend using modern technologies like Node.js, React, PostgreSQL, Leaflet, Redis, and others. I have led high-impact projects such as AI-powered video surveillance systems, real-time radio control, and municipal management automation. I specialize in creating efficient, automated, and results-driven solutions.
